headline.main: NEW ZEALAND BACKS OUR WAR STRATEGY; But Envoy Says His People Yearn for Blitz Against Japan

lead_paragraph: Walter Nash, New Zealand's Minister to the United States, in an address at Town Hall yesterday, said that while his country realized that the United Nations first must concentrate against Germany, "we want to see a blitz against Japan that will knock her out of the war the moment such a blitz becomes a strategic possibility."
abstract: Min Nash says NZ is eager for offensive against Japan, Town Hall s
